thread.title: Spectrum Brands to merge with HRG in $10 bln deal

title: Spectrum Brands to merge with HRG in $10 bln deal
text:
Spectrum Brands to merge with HRG in $10 bln deal 2:11am IST - 01:24 
Batteries and pet food maker, Spectrum Brands, will merge with its biggest shareholder, HRG Group, a holding company, in a $10 billion deal. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Batteries and pet food maker, Spectrum Brands, will merge with its biggest shareholder, HRG Group, a holding company, in a $10 billion deal. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CIMsQX
